name: Eye Know: Halloween
description:
Can you spot the tricks from the treats?
In Eye Know: Halloween you find the scariest of images and the sweetest of sweets!

Prepare to have the pants scared off of you with Eye Know: Halloween! By far the spookiest games in the Eye Know series, identify images of skeletons, zombies, vampire bats, jack-o'-lanterns and witches as they distort in a variety of 11 different effects, from twisted images to sliding puzzles!

With 60 images to identify, Eye Know: Halloween is good for a few hours of free fun! If you want to play more levels, there are over 1000 more images to play in the rest of the Eye Know series of apps!

Eye Know is great for everyone! Is the image too hard to recognize? Just tap it and reveal more for a cut of your prize! If you're still stuck, you can bomb away the wrong letters, reveal a correct letter, and even skip the image altogether!
